00034 #include <nucleus/thread.h>

00037 /* Creation flags */
00038 #define XNREUSE  0x00000001     /* Reuse pod with identical properties */
00039 
00040 /* Pod status flags */
00041 #define XNRPRIO  0x00000002     /* Reverse priority scheme */
00042 #define XNTIMED  0x00000004     /* Timer started */
00043 #define XNTMSET  0x00000008     /* Pod time has been set */
00044 #define XNTMPER  0x00000010     /* Periodic timing */
00045 #define XNFATAL  0x00000020     /* Pod encountered a fatal error */
00046 #define XNPIDLE  0x00000040     /* Pod is unavailable (initializing/shutting down) */
00047 #define XNTLOCK  0x00000080     /* Timer lock pending */
00048 
00049 /* Sched status flags */
00050 #define XNKCOUT  0x80000000     /* Sched callout context */
00051 #define XNHTICK  0x40000000     /* Host tick pending  */
00052 
00053 /* These flags are available to the real-time interfaces */
00054 #define XNPOD_SPARE0  0x01000000
00055 #define XNPOD_SPARE1  0x02000000
00056 #define XNPOD_SPARE2  0x04000000
00057 #define XNPOD_SPARE3  0x08000000
00058 #define XNPOD_SPARE4  0x10000000
00059 #define XNPOD_SPARE5  0x20000000
00060 #define XNPOD_SPARE6  0x40000000
00061 #define XNPOD_SPARE7  0x80000000
00062 
00063 /* Flags for context checking */
00064 #define XNPOD_THREAD_CONTEXT     0x1 /* Regular thread */
00065 #define XNPOD_INTERRUPT_CONTEXT  0x2 /* Interrupt service thread */
00066 #define XNPOD_HOOK_CONTEXT       0x4 /* Nanokernel hook */
00067 #define XNPOD_ROOT_CONTEXT       0x8 /* Root thread */
00068 
00069 #define XNPOD_NORMAL_EXIT  0x0
00070 #define XNPOD_FATAL_EXIT   0x1
00071 
00072 #define XNPOD_DEFAULT_TICKHANDLER  (&xnpod_announce_tick)
00073 
00074 #define XNPOD_ALL_CPUS  XNARCH_CPU_MASK_ALL
00075 
00076 #define XNPOD_HEAPSIZE  (CONFIG_XENO_OPT_SYS_HEAPSZ * 1024)
00077 #define XNPOD_PAGESIZE  512
00078 #define XNPOD_RUNPRIO   0x80000000 /* Placeholder for "stdthread priority" */
00079 
00080 /* Flags for xnpod_schedule_runnable() */
00081 #define XNPOD_SCHEDFIFO 0x0
00082 #define XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO 0x1
00083 #define XNPOD_NOSWITCH  0x2
00084 
00085 /* Normal root thread priority == min_std_prio - 1 */
00086 #define XNPOD_ROOT_PRIO_BASE   ((nkpod)->root_prio_base)

00155 #endif /* CONFIG_SMP */

00157 #define xnsched_resched_mask() \
00158     (xnpod_current_sched()->resched)
00159 
00160 #define xnsched_resched_p()                     \
00161     (!xnarch_cpus_empty(xnsched_resched_mask()))
00162 
00163 #define xnsched_tst_resched(__sched__) \
00164     xnarch_cpu_isset(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00165

00167     xnarch_cpu_set(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())

00169 #define xnsched_clr_resched(__sched__) \
00170     xnarch_cpu_clear(xnsched_cpu(__sched__), xnsched_resched_mask())
00171 
00172 #define xnsched_clr_mask(__sched__) \
00173     xnarch_cpus_clear((__sched__)->resched)

00273 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_WATCHDOG
00274 static inline void xnpod_reset_watchdog (xnsched_t *sched)
00275 {
00276     sched->watchdog_trigger = xnarch_get_cpu_tsc() + nkpod->watchdog_reload;
00277     sched->watchdog_armed = 0;
00278 }

00285 static inline int xnpod_get_qdir (xnpod_t *pod)
00286 {
00287     /* Returns the queuing direction of threads for a given pod */
00288     return testbits(pod->status,XNRPRIO) ? xnqueue_up : xnqueue_down;
00289 }
00290 
00291 static inline int xnpod_get_minprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00292 {
00293     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00294         pod->minpri + incr :
00295         pod->minpri - incr;
00296 }
00297 
00298 static inline int xnpod_get_maxprio (xnpod_t *pod, int incr)
00299 {
00300     return xnpod_get_qdir(pod) == xnqueue_up ?
00301         pod->maxpri - incr :
00302         pod->maxpri + incr;
00303 }
00304 
00305 static inline int xnpod_compare_prio (int inprio, int outprio)
00306 {
00307     /* Returns a negative, null or positive value whether inprio is
00308        lower than, equal to or greater than outprio. */
00309     int delta = inprio - outprio;
00310     return testbits(nkpod->status,XNRPRIO) ? -delta : delta;
00311 }
00312 
00313 static inline int xnpod_rescale_prio (int prio)
00314 {
00315     return xnpod_get_qdir(nkpod) == xnqueue_up ?
00316         nkpod->minpri - prio :
00317         nkpod->maxpri - prio - 1;
00318 }
00319 
00320 static inline void xnpod_renice_root (int prio)
00321 
00322 {
00323     xnthread_t *rootcb;
00324     spl_t s;
00325 
00326     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00327     rootcb = &nkpod->sched[xnarch_current_cpu()].rootcb;
00328     rootcb->cprio = prio;
00329     xnpod_schedule_runnable(rootcb,XNPOD_SCHEDLIFO|XNPOD_NOSWITCH);
00330     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00331 }
00332 
00333     /* -- Beginning of the exported interface */
00334 
00335 #define xnpod_sched_slot(cpu) \
00336     (&nkpod->sched[cpu])
00337 
00338 #define xnpod_current_sched() \
00339     xnpod_sched_slot(xnarch_current_cpu())
00340 
00341 #define xnpod_interrupt_p() \
00342     (xnpod_current_sched()->inesting > 0)
00343 
00344 #define xnpod_callout_p() \
00345     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_sched()->status,XNKCOUT))
00346 
00347 #define xnpod_asynch_p() \
00348     (xnpod_interrupt_p() || xnpod_callout_p())
00349 
00350 #define xnpod_current_thread() \
00351     (xnpod_current_sched()->runthread)
00352 
00353 #define xnpod_current_root() \
00354     (&xnpod_current_sched()->rootcb)
00355 
00356 #define xnpod_current_p(thread) \
00357     (xnpod_current_thread() == (thread))
00358 
00359 #define xnpod_locked_p() \
00360     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK))
00361 
00362 #define xnpod_unblockable_p() \
00363     (xnpod_asynch_p() || testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNLOCK|XNROOT))
00364 
00365 #define xnpod_root_p() \
00366     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT))
00367 
00368 #define xnpod_shadow_p() \
00369     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNSHADOW))
00370 
00371 #define xnpod_userspace_p() \
00372     (!!testbits(xnpod_current_thread()->status,XNROOT|XNSHADOW))
00373 
00374 #define xnpod_primary_p() \
00375     (!(xnpod_asynch_p() || xnpod_root_p()))
00376 
00377 #define xnpod_secondary_p() \
00378     (xnpod_root_p())
00379 
00380 #define xnpod_idle_p() xnpod_root_p()
00381 
00382 #define xnpod_timeset_p() \
00383     (!!testbits(nkpod->status,XNTMSET))

00385 static inline u_long xnpod_get_ticks2sec (void)
00386 {
00387     return nkpod->ticks2sec;
00388 }
00389 
00390 static inline u_long xnpod_get_tickval (void)
00391 {
00392     /* Returns the duration of a tick in nanoseconds */
00393     return nkpod->tickvalue;
00394 }
00395 
00396 static inline xntime_t xnpod_ticks2ns (xnticks_t ticks)
00397 {
00398     /* Convert a count of ticks in nanoseconds */
00399 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00400     return ticks * xnpod_get_tickval();
00401 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00402     return ticks;
00403 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00404 }
00405 
00406 static inline xnticks_t xnpod_ns2ticks (xntime_t t)
00407 {
00408 #ifdef CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC
00409     return xnarch_ulldiv(t,xnpod_get_tickval(),NULL);
00410 #else /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00411     return t;
00412 #endif /* !CONFIG_XENO_OPT_TIMING_PERIODIC */
00413 }

00471 static inline void xnpod_lock_sched (void)
00472 {
00473     spl_t s;
00474 
00475     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00476 
00477     if (nkpod->schedlck++ == 0)
00478         __setbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00479 
00480     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00481 }
00482 
00483 static inline void xnpod_unlock_sched (void)
00484 {
00485     spl_t s;
00486 
00487     xnlock_get_irqsave(&nklock,s);
00488 
00489     if (--nkpod->schedlck == 0)
00490         {
00491         __clrbits(xnpod_current_sched()->runthread->status,XNLOCK);
00492         xnpod_schedule();
00493         }
00494 
00495     xnlock_put_irqrestore(&nklock,s);
00496 }

00527 static inline void xnpod_yield (void)
00528 {
00529     xnpod_resume_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),0);
00530     xnpod_schedule();
00531 }

00533 static inline void xnpod_delay (xnticks_t timeout)
00534 {
00535     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNDELAY,timeout,NULL);
00536 }

00538 static inline void xnpod_suspend_self (void)
00539 {
00540     xnpod_suspend_thread(xnpod_current_thread(),XNSUSP,XN_INFINITE,NULL);
00541 }
00542 
00543 static inline void xnpod_delete_self (void)
00544 {
00545     xnpod_delete_thread(xnpod_current_thread());
